mapper.select: SELECT location, locationen, lat, lon FROM dominications where no = #{no}
mapper.update: UPDATE dominications SET sunrise = #{sunrise}, sunset = #{sunset}, drop = #{drop}, weather0 = #{weather0}, temp0 = #{temp0}, humid0 = #{humid0}, weather1 = #{weather1}, temp1 = #{temp1}, time1 = #{time1}, drop1 = #{drop1}, weather2 = #{weather2}, temp2 = #{temp2}, time2 = #{time2}, drop2 = #{drop2}, weather3 = #{weather3}, temp3 = #{temp3}, time3 = #{time3}, drop3 = #{drop3}, weather4 = #{weather4}, temp4 = #{temp4}, time4 = #{time4}, drop4 = #{drop4}, weather5 = #{weather5}, temp5 = #{temp5}, time5 = #{time5}, drop5 = #{drop5} where location = #{location}

create table asanweather.weather_${locationen} (`no` INT(2) not NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `date` BIGINT not NULL, `weather` VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, `temp` DOUBLE not NULL, `humid` DOUBLE not null, `time` BIGINT not NULL, `drop` DOUBLE not null, PRIMARY KEY (`no`) USING BTREE)
